title: A brief review of in situ spectroscopic methods and electrochemical sensors as essential evaluation tools for the electrochemical reduction of CO2 (ElRC)
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1607-1618
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01723K, Review Article
V. S. K. Yadav, Mohammed A. H. S. Saad, Mohammed J. Al-Marri, Anand Kumar
Spectroscopic methods and electrochemical sensor tools can fill the significant knowledge gap, which is necessary to comprehend Electrochemical CO2 Reduction (ElRC) correctly and build effective catalysts and reactors for ElRC reactions.
